      • createIntroScene

        private void createIntroScene()
        Method creates a scene for the beginning window.

      • createGardenDesignScene

        public void createGardenDesignScene()
        Creates a scene for the garden design. The parent pane is bp which is a BorderPane.

        At the center there is a AnchorPane apGarden which is where the garden is. To the left ther is a TableView plant Table which is a plant selection menu. On the top there is a BorderPane bpCurrent which is modified by currentBudgetAndLepCountDisplay() On the bottom there is a BorderPane bottomPane which contains a Button currentPlantsButton

      • setGardenSize

        public void setGardenSize()
        Sets the size of the garden so it reflects the size inputted by the user.

        sizing is used to make sure that the whole garden fits on the screen. the ratio values make sure that garden's size ratio is the same as the one inputted by the user.

      • createNewImage

        public void createNewImage​(Plant p,
                           javafx.scene.image.ImageView img)
        Creates an ImageView of a plant on the garden.

        When a plant is selected it adds an ImageView to the garden at (x,y) coordinates. Sets up action handlers for mouse events allowing to drag and drop the plant.

        Parameters:
        img - the ImageView of the plant added to the garden.

      • restoreOldImage

        public void restoreOldImage​(Plant p,
                            javafx.scene.image.ImageView img)

      • currentBudgetAndLepCountDisplay

        private void currentBudgetAndLepCountDisplay()
        Displays currentBudget and currentLepCount in the top right corner.

        Sets up a BorderPane bpCurrent on top of the bp. Adds a GridPane current to the right of the bpCurrent containing labels.

      • calculationsPlantAdded

        public void calculationsPlantAdded​(Plant plant)
        Calls methods modifying currentBudget and currentLepCount as well as increments the frequency of how many times a certain type of plant has been used.
        Parameters:
        plant - the plant that has been added to the garden

      • calculationsPlantRemoved

        public void calculationsPlantRemoved​(Plant plant)
        Calls methods modifying currentBudget and currentLepCount as well as increments the frequency of how many times a certain type of plant has been used but for plant removal
        Parameters:
        plant - the plant that has been removed from the garden

      • currentBudgetAndLepCount

        public void currentBudgetAndLepCount()
        Calls a method from the controller calculating currentBudget and currentLepCount.

        Changes the values of the labels displaying the values of currentBudget and currentLepCount.

      • dragImage

        public void dragImage​(Plant p,
                      javafx.scene.shape.Shape img)
        Changes the x an y of an ImageView that is being dragged.
        Parameters:
        img - the ImageView that is being dragged

      • checkBounds

        private void checkBounds​(javafx.scene.shape.Shape block)
        Checks if two images collide with each other.

        If two images collide with each other the picture changes color to black and white.

        Parameters:
        block -

      • searchFindsPlants

        private boolean searchFindsPlants​(Plant plant,
                                  java.lang.String searchText)
        Search for inputted sequene of characters in the list of plants.

        https://edencoding.com/search-bar-dynamic-filtering/

        Parameters:
        plant -
        searchText -
        Returns:
        whether there is a chracter used in any of the plants.

      • filterList

        private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Plant> filterList​(java.util.List<Plant> list,
                                                            java.lang.String searchText)
        Goes through the list of plants searching for those cointaing searched sequence of characters.

        https://edencoding.com/search-bar-dynamic-filtering/

        Parameters:
        list -
        searchText -
        Returns:
        an observable list of plants with the character inputted.

      • addPlantToCurrentPlants

        public void addPlantToCurrentPlants​(Plant p)
        Adds a plant to the TableView currentPlantsTable.

        Iterates through a ObservableList of all the names of currently used plants. If the plant has already been used it will do nothing.

        Parameters:
        p - , a plant added to the garden

      • removePlantToCurrentPlants

        private void removePlantToCurrentPlants​(Plant p)
        Called when removing a plant, checks if 0 plants are in a spot in current plants Removes the spot on the table if at 0
        Parameters:
        p - the plant that is being removed

      • createCreateGardenScene

        private void createCreateGardenScene()
        Creates a scene for the user's input window.

        It creates a scene containing a GridPane which is populated with labels, text fields and combo boxes used for user's input. It calls methods: setSizeInput(), setSunLevelInput(), setSoilTypeInput(), setMoistureLevelInput() and setBudgetInput(). Contains a Button continueButton which changes the scene and saves all the data.

      • setSizeInput

        private void setSizeInput()
        Adds labels and text field for size input

      • setSunLevelInput

        private void setSunLevelInput()
        Adds labels and drop down menus for sunlight level input
